name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
description: The latest iPhone with a ProMotion display, improved camera system, and A16 Bionic chip for enhanced performance.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Samsung's flagship smartphone featuring a 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and an expansive AMOLED display.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: High-end noise-canceling headphones offering superior sound quality, long battery life, and advanced noise-cancellation technology.

name: Oculus Quest 3
description: A standalone VR headset with improved graphics, a lighter design, and a more comfortable fit for immersive virtual reality experiences.

name: Apple Watch Series 8
description: The latest Apple Watch featuring advanced health tracking, a larger always-on display, and improved durability.

name: Google Pixel 7
description: Google's newest smartphone offering a refined design, enhanced camera features, and the latest version of Android with exclusive features.
